title: Modelling of UV Picosecond Laser Interaction with Nanotips for Application in Atom Probe Tomography
content: Understanding the thermal behaviour of nanotips when irradiated by ultrafast pulsed laser is crucial in high resolution characterization techniques like Atom Probe Tomography (APT) and Surface Enhanced Raman Spectroscopy (SERS). It is essential to develop a good understanding of the thermal behaviour of specimen to tackle challenges like inaccurate reconstruction, thermal tailing, and re-crystallization (bio-samples) in APT characterization [1,2].
